description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
112a Hazellville Road, Islington, London, N19 3NA

TPO Reference:
T10â€“ Yew of LBI TPO HIGHVIEW (NO.2) 1977

PO Number:
T090155

Work specifications:
1x Yew (T10) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO HIGHVIEW (NO.2) 1977
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 5.5m above ground level over the highway.
Crown lift the remainder up to a maximum height of 3m above ground level 
Prune back from the front of the property to give 2-3 m clearance.
Lightly reduce overlong laterals into crown line.
decision_conditions: The orginal application to lift the crown by 3m was deemed excessive by the planning authority and lesser works to lift the crown to 3m agreed with the agent. Similarly the original included an application to reduce the lateral branches by 2 - 3m, these works were  deemed excessive and detremental to the amenity value of the tree , they were removed with the agreement of the agent.
